#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	string a,b;
	int f=0;
	while(t--)
	{
		f=1;
		cin>>a>>b;
		int l1 = a.length();
		int l2=b.length();
		if(l1!=(l2+1))
		{
			cout<<"0\n";
			continue;
		}
		int cnt=0;
		for(int i=0,j=0;i<l1&&j<l2;)
		{
			if(a[i]==b[j])
			{
				i++;j++;
			}
			else
			{
				i++;cnt++;
			}
			if(cnt>1)
			{
				f=0;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(f)
			cout<<"1\n";
		else
			cout<<"0\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
